verses.name: Ezekiel 39:4
verses.text: Thou shalt fall upon the mountains of Israel, thou, and all thy bands, and the people that is with thee: I will give thee unto the ravenous birds of every sort, and to the beasts of the field to be devoured.

verses.name: Ezekiel 39:5
verses.text: Thou shalt fall upon the open field: for I have spoken it, saith the Lord God.

verses.name: Ezekiel 39:6
verses.text: And I will send a fire on Magog, and among them that dwell carelessly in the isles: and they shall know that I am the Lord.
